problem_text: (Appears on Page 2): If an experiment observed a p-value for an ANOVA as 0.00778, what you can say about the conclusion regarding the null hypothesis associated with this ANOVA at 5% significant level.

steps.description: We are comparing the observed p-value from the ANOVA test to the pre-determined significance level, which is 5% (or 0.05). The p-value tells us the probability of obtaining results at least as extreme as the ones we observed, assuming the null hypothesis is true. The significance level (α) is the threshold we set for deciding when to reject the null hypothesis. If the p-value is less than or equal to α, it means the observed data is unlikely under the null hypothesis, so we have evidence against it. Here, we check if 0.00778 ≤ 0.05, which is true.

Since the p-value is less than the significance level, we reject the null hypothesis. In the context of ANOVA, the null hypothesis (H₀) states that all group means are equal (i.e., no significant difference among the groups). Rejecting H₀ means we have sufficient statistical evidence to conclude that at least one group mean is different from the others. This conclusion is made at the 5% significance level, meaning there's only a 5% chance of making such a conclusion if the null hypothesis were actually true (Type I error risk).
steps.latex: \text{Since } p\text{-value} \leq \alpha, \text{ reject the null hypothesis } H_0.

generated_code:
import sympy as sp
import numpy as np
import mpmath
import scipy
import math

# Define the given values
p_value = sp.Rational(778, 100000)  # 0.00778 as rational
alpha = sp.Rational(5, 100)         # 5% = 0.05 as rational

# Step 1: Compare p-value to significance level
step1_desc = "Compare p-value to significance level α = 0.05"
step1_expr = "p_value <= alpha"
step1_result = str(p_value <= alpha)
step1_latex = f"{sp.latex(p_value)} \\leq {sp.latex(alpha)}"
step1_code = f"comparison = p_value <= alpha"

# Execute step 1
comparison = p_value <= alpha

# Step 2: Determine conclusion based on comparison
step2_desc = "Determine conclusion about null hypothesis"
if comparison:
    conclusion = "Reject the null hypothesis"
    step2_expr = "Since p-value ≤ α, reject H₀"
    step2_result = conclusion
    step2_latex = r"\text{Since } p\text{-value} \leq \alpha, \text{ reject } H_0"
else:
    conclusion = "Fail to reject the null hypothesis"
    step2_expr = "Since p-value > α, fail to reject H₀"
    step2_result = conclusion
    step2_latex = r"\text{Since } p\text{-value} > \alpha, \text{ fail to reject } H_0"

step2_code = f"conclusion = '{conclusion}'"

# Set final result
_result = conclusion
_result_latex = sp.latex(_result)

# Compile steps
_steps = [
    {
        "description": step1_desc,
        "expression": step1_expr,
        "result": step1_result,
        "latex": step1_latex,
        "code": step1_code
    },
    {
        "description": step2_desc,
        "expression": step2_expr,
        "result": step2_result,
        "latex": step2_latex,
        "code": step2_code
    }
]
